items.badge_description: You raise your glass so much you barely have time to drink it! Cheers! Toast to 15 check-ins in a month.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 5 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 15 check-ins with a photo.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 10 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 2!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 15 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 110 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 23!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 185 check-ins with a photo.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 65 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 14!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 15 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Known for their pale lagers and pilsners, the Czech Republic has a long standing tradition of brewing. With the highest beer consumption per capita in the world, you’ll fit right in. That's 10 different beers from a brewery from the Czech Republic. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 30 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 85 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 18!

Known for their pale lagers and pilsners, the Czech Republic has a long standing tradition of brewing. With the highest beer consumption per capita in the world, you’ll fit right in. That's 40 different beers from a brewery from the Czech Republic. Try 5 more for Level 9!

user.bio: The lady often featured in my photos is Noemi. Be nice to her, she bites.

items.checkin_comment: Beloning na een hele dag op de piste!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 450 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 91!
